member.name: WS_UNIQUE_ID.uri
member.summary: A string representation of the URI. If length is zero, then the unique ID is a guid, and the value is stored in the guid field. Otherwise, the URI is a string and the string value is stored in the uri field.

member.name: WS_UNIQUE_ID.guid
member.summary: If the uri.length field is 0, then this field contains the GUID representation of the unique ID. Otherwise the value of the field is not defined.
